snippet: After Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei and former President Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani registered for the June election, the country’s governing establishment responded with anger.
abstract: Two game-changing politicians--Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei, protege of Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, and former Pres Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani--sign up at last minute as candidates for Iran's presidential elections, drawing ire of country's governing establishment.
lead_paragraph: After Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei and former President Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani registered for the June election, the country’s governing establishment responded with anger.

headline.seo: 2 Candidates in Iran Draw Strong Reactions
headline.main: 2 Presidential Candidates in Iran Draw Resentment
headline.print_headline: 2 Presidential Candidates in Iran Draw Resentment
